frmt_msg: An event limit has been reached and needs to be acknowledged.  Event or Priority:  @lmt_nam In the time of @tm_int minute(s) the number of events raised has exceeded limit @limit_num events.  All @lmt_nam events that follow will be put on hold.

subfld: Held alert count has exceeded limit - at @count
frmt_msg: Held alert count is now at @count. Please review the alerts in held status to release or cancel the alerts.

subfld: Wave (@schbat) has run and generated (@no_wrkref) picktasks.
frmt_msg:
Wave @schbat has just completed with the following work:
                            Warehouse: @wh_id
                            Wave: @schbat
                            Pickgroup: @pckgr1
                            Nbr of Shipment(s): @no_ship_id
                            Nbr of Order(s): @no_ordnum
                            Nbr of Pick task(s): @no_wrkref
                            Qty to be picked: @sum_pckqty
                            Shortage?: @has_shorts

                            Order: @ordnum
